hero.title: Full-Stack Architecture
hero.description: JAYU is a computer use agent built using the Google Gemini 1.5 models. It directly interacts with your computer, clicking buttons, typing text, and analyzing context to perform full tasks.
hero.ranking: Winner of the 2024 Google Gemini API Developer Competition
